com.brightcove.auth.ap.delegates

Class AdobePassDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brightcove.auth.ap.delegates.AccessEnablerCallbackDelegate
      • com.brightcove.auth.ap.delegates.AdobePassDelegate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.adobe.adobepass.accessenabler.api.IAccessEnablerDelegate, IAuthDelegate

    public class AdobePassDelegate
extends AccessEnablerCallbackDelegate
implements IAuthDelegate
    Singleton class that manages all the interaction with the underlying Adobe Pass library. Directly handles all the API calls, and using its super class AccessEnablerCallbackDelegate for all the callbacks.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Maximilian Nyman (max.nyman@anvilcreative.com)
    See Also:
    AccessEnablerCallbackDelegate

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.brightcove.auth.ap.delegates.AccessEnablerCallbackDelegate
